definitions.text: a division of some larger or more complex organization
examples: botany is a branch of biology
the Germanic branch of Indo-European languages

definitions.text: a division of a stem, or secondary stem arising from the main stem of a plant
a part of a forked or branching shape
examples: he broke off one of the branches

definitions.text: a stream or river connected to a larger one
any projection that is thought to resemble a human arm
examples: the arm of the record player

definitions.text: grow and send out branches or branch-like structures
examples: these plants ramify early and get to be very large

definitions.text: divide into two or more branches so as to form a fork
